### מערכות לינאריות - מטלה 1 - יובל סרף

        * אי זוגי
            <p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /></p>
    2.
        * זוגי
            <p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /></p>
        * אי זוגי
            <p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /></p>
    3.
        1.
            $$x_{(t)} = \sin (\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4})$$
            $$x_{(t)} = x_{e(t)} + x_{o(t)}$$
            $$x_{e(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(x_{(t)} + x_{(-t)})$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(x_{(t)} - x_{(-t)})$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x_{(-t)} = \sin (-\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4})$$
            $$x_{e(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(\sin (\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}) + \sin (-\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}))$$
            $$\sin (\alpha) + \sin (\beta) = 2\sin(\frac{\alpha + \beta}{2}) \cdot \cos(\frac{\alpha - \beta}{2})$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x_{e(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(2 \sin (\frac{\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4} - \omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}}{2}) \cdot \cos (\frac{\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4} + \omega_0 t - \frac{\pi}{4}}{2}))$$
            $$x_{e(t)} = \sin (\frac{\pi}{4}) \cdot \cos (\omega_0 t)$$
            $$x_{e(t)} = \frac{1}{\sqrt[]{2}} \cdot \cos (\omega_0 t)$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(\sin (\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}) - \sin (-\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}))$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(\sin (\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}) + \sin (\omega_0 t - \frac{\pi}{4}))$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \frac{1}{2}(2\sin (\frac{\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4} + \omega_0 t - \frac{\pi}{4}}{2}) \cdot \cos (\frac{\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4} - \omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}}{2}))$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \sin (\frac{\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4} + \omega_0 t - \frac{\pi}{4}}{2}) \cdot \cos (\frac{\omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4} - \omega_0 t + \frac{\pi}{4}}{2})$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \sin (\omega_0 t) \cdot \cos (\frac{\pi}{4})$$
            $$x_{o(t)} = \frac{1}{\sqrt[]{2}}\sin (\omega_0 t)$$
        2.
            $$x[n] = e^{i(\Omega_0 n + \frac{\pi}{2})}$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(x[n] + x[-n])$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x[-n] = e^{i(-\Omega_0 n + \frac{\pi}{2})}$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(e^{i(\Omega_0 n + \frac{\pi}{2})} + e^{i(-\Omega_0 n + \frac{\pi}{2})})$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}\cdot e^{i\Omega_0 n} + e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}\cdot e^{-i\Omega_0 n})$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}(e^{i\Omega_0 n} + e^{-i\Omega_0 n})$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}(\frac{\cos (\Omega_0 n)+ i\sin (\Omega_0 n) + cos(-\Omega_0 n) + i\sin(-\Omega_0 n)}{2})$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}(\frac{\cos (\Omega_0 n)+ i\sin (\Omega_0 n) + cos(\Omega_0 n) - i\sin(\Omega_0 n)}{2})$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}(\frac{2\cos (\Omega_0 n)}{2})$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}\cos (\Omega_0 n)$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = (\cos (\frac{\pi}{2}) + i\sin(\frac{\pi}{2}))\cdot \cos (\Omega_0 n)$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = (0 + i)\cdot \cos (\Omega_0 n)$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = i\cos (\Omega_0 n)$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(x[n] - x[-n])$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(e^{i(\Omega_0 n + \frac{\pi}{2})} - e^{i(-\Omega_0 n + \frac{\pi}{2})})$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}e^{i\frac{\pi}{2}}(e^{i\Omega_0 n} - e^{-i\Omega_0 n})$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(\cos (\frac{\pi}{2}) + i\sin(\frac{\pi}{2}))(e^{i\Omega_0 n} - e^{-i\Omega_0 n})$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(0 + i)(e^{i\Omega_0 n} - e^{-i\Omega_0 n})$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{i}{2}(\cos (\Omega_0 n) +i\sin(\Omega_0 n) - cos(-\Omega_0 n) -i\sin(-\Omega_0 n))$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{i}{2}(\cos (\Omega_0 n) +i\sin(\Omega_0 n) - cos(\Omega_0 n) +i\sin(\Omega_0 n))$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{i}{2}(2i\sin(\Omega_0 n))$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = i(i\sin(\Omega_0 n))$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = -\sin(\Omega_0 n)$$
        3.
            $$x[n] = \delta [n]$$
            $$x[-n] = \delta [-n] = \delta [n]$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(x[n] + x[-n])$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(\delta [n] + \delta [n])$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(2\delta [n])$$
            $$x_{e}[n] = \delta [n]$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(x[n] - x[-n])$$
            $$\Downarrow$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}(\delta [n] - \delta [n])$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = \frac{1}{2}\cdot 0$$
            $$x_{o}[n] = 0$$
3.
    1.  מכפלה של שני אותות זוגיים נותנת אות זוגי

        $$x(t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t)$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(-t)\cdot x_2(-t)$$
        $$x_1(t)\ \ even \Rightarrow  x_1(t) = x_1(-t)$$
        $$x_2(t)\ \ even \Rightarrow  x_2(t) = x_2(-t)$$
        $$\Downarrow$$
        $$x(t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t) = x(-t)$$
        $$x(t) = x(-t)$$
    2.  מכפלה של שני אותות אי זוגיים נותנת אות זוגי

        $$x(t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t)$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(-t)\cdot x_2(-t)$$
        $$x_1(t)\ \ odd \Rightarrow  x_1(t) = -x_1(-t)$$
        $$x_2(t)\ \ odd \Rightarrow  x_2(t) = -x_2(-t)$$
        $$\Downarrow$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(-t)\cdot x_2(-t)$$
        $$x(-t) = -x_1(t)\cdot (-x_2(t))$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t)$$
        $$\Downarrow$$
        $$x(t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t) = x(-t)$$
        $$x(t) = x(-t)$$
    3.  מכפלה של אות זוג באי זוגי נותנת אות אי זוגי

        $$x(t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t)$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(-t)\cdot x_2(-t)$$
        $$x_1(t)\ \ even \Rightarrow  x_1(t) = x_1(-t)$$
        $$x_2(t)\ \ odd \Rightarrow  x_2(t) = -x_2(-t)$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(-t)\cdot x_2(-t)$$
        $$x(-t) = x_1(t)\cdot (-x_2(t))$$
        $$-x(-t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t)$$
        $$\Downarrow$$
        $$x(t) = x_1(t)\cdot x_2(t) = -x(-t)$$
        $$x(t) = -x(-t)$$
